attributes.action: To ban the selling of disposable barbecues
attributes.additional_details: I want the government to ban disposable BBQs because it is ruining the landscape and people don't understand when you put metal on grass it can ducks and the heat just travels through. And some of the damage you can still see today I know the fire up them the Roaches you can still clearly see it is still taking effect and they reckon habitats for the future for both humans and animals
attributes.background: I would like to ban the use of disposable BBQs cause they are damaging local areas habitats you name it they are really damaging it. People don't understand how to use them safely or dispose of them safely
